checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] Latest password hashing mechanism (PWDSALTEDHASH) used
checkitem.compliant: USER_TYPE like '%' and BCODE = 'UNUSED' and PASSCODE = 'UNUSED' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER like '%'
checkitem.noncompliant: USER_TYPE like '%' and (BCODE = 'USED' or PASSCODE = 'USED' ) and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER like '%'

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] Latest password hashing mechanism (PWDSALTEDHASH) used
checkitem.compliant: USER_TYPE like '%' and BCODE = 'USED' and PASSCODE like '%' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER = '0.00'
checkitem.noncompliant: USER_TYPE like '%' and BCODE = 'USED' and PASSCODE like '%' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER > '0.00'

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] Latest password hashing mechanism (PWDSALTEDHASH) used
checkitem.compliant: USER_TYPE like '%' and BCODE like '%' and PASSCODE = 'USED' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER = '0.00'
checkitem.noncompliant: USER_TYPE like '%' and BCODE like '%' and PASSCODE = 'USED' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER > '0.00'

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] Password hashing for COMMUNICATION user (1)
checkitem.compliant: USER_TYPE = 'COMMUNICATION' and BCODE like '%' and PASSCODE like '%' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER = '0' and PERC_USER like '%'
checkitem.noncompliant: USER_TYPE = 'COMMUNICATION' and BCODE like '%' and PASSCODE like '%' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER != '0' and PERC_USER like '%'

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] Password hashing for DIALOG user (1)
checkitem.compliant: USER_TYPE = 'DIALOG' and BCODE = 'UNUSED' and PASSCODE = 'UNUSED' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER like '%'
checkitem.noncompliant: USER_TYPE = 'DIALOG' and NOT ( BCODE = 'UNUSED' or PASSCODE = 'UNUSED' ) and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER like '%'

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] Password hashing for DIALOG user (2)
checkitem.compliant: USER_TYPE = 'DIALOG' and BCODE = 'USED' and PASSCODE like '%' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER <= '5.00'
checkitem.noncompliant: USER_TYPE = 'DIALOG' and BCODE = 'USED' and PASSCODE like '%' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and not ( PERC_USER <= '5.00' )

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] Password hashing for DIALOG user (3)
checkitem.compliant: USER_TYPE = 'DIALOG' and BCODE like '%' and PASSCODE = 'USED' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER <= '5.00'
checkitem.noncompliant: USER_TYPE = 'DIALOG' and BCODE like '%' and PASSCODE = 'USED' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and not ( PERC_USER <= '5.00' )

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] Password hashing for REFERENCE user (1)
checkitem.compliant: USER_TYPE = 'REFERENCE' and BCODE = 'UNUSED' and PASSCODE = 'UNUSED' and PWDSALTEDHASH = 'UNUSED' and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER like '%'
checkitem.noncompliant: USER_TYPE = 'REFERENCE' and not ( BCODE = 'UNUSED' or PASSCODE = 'UNUSED' or PWDSALTEDHASH = 'UNUSED' ) and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER like '%'

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] Password hashing for REFERENCE user (2)
checkitem.compliant: USER_TYPE = 'REFERENCE' and BCODE = 'USED' and PASSCODE like '%' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER = '0' and PERC_USER like '%'
checkitem.noncompliant: USER_TYPE = 'REFERENCE' and BCODE = 'USED' and PASSCODE like '%' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER != '0' and PERC_USER like '%'

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] Password hashing for REFERENCE user (3)
checkitem.compliant: USER_TYPE = 'REFERENCE' and BCODE like '%' and PASSCODE = 'USED' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER = '0' and PERC_USER like '%'
checkitem.noncompliant: USER_TYPE = 'REFERENCE' and BCODE like '%' and PASSCODE = 'USED' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER != '0' and PERC_USER like '%'

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] Password hashing for REFERENCE user (4)
checkitem.compliant: USER_TYPE = 'REFERENCE' and BCODE like '%' and PASSCODE like '%' and PWDSALTEDHASH = 'USED' and NUM_USER = '0' and PERC_USER like '%'
checkitem.noncompliant: USER_TYPE = 'REFERENCE' and BCODE like '%' and PASSCODE like '%' and PWDSALTEDHASH = 'USED' and NUM_USER != '0' and PERC_USER like '%'

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] Password hashing for SERVICE user (1)
checkitem.compliant: USER_TYPE = 'SERVICE' and BCODE = 'UNUSED' and PASSCODE = 'UNUSED' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER like '%'
checkitem.noncompliant: USER_TYPE = 'SERVICE' and not ( BCODE = 'UNUSED' or PASSCODE = 'UNUSED' ) and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER like '%'

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] Password hashing for SERVICE user (2)
checkitem.compliant: USER_TYPE = 'SERVICE' and BCODE = 'USED' and PASSCODE like '%' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER <= '0.00'
checkitem.noncompliant: USER_TYPE = 'SERVICE' and BCODE = 'USED' and PASSCODE like '%' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and not ( PERC_USER <= '0.00' )

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] Password hashing for SERVICE user (3)
checkitem.compliant: USER_TYPE = 'SERVICE' and BCODE like '%' and PASSCODE = 'USED' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER <= '0.00'
checkitem.noncompliant: USER_TYPE = 'SERVICE' and BCODE like '%' and PASSCODE = 'USED' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and not ( PERC_USER <= '0.00' )

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] Password hashing for SYSTEM user (1)
checkitem.compliant: USER_TYPE = 'SYSTEM' and BCODE = 'UNUSED' and PASSCODE = 'UNUSED' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER like '%'
checkitem.noncompliant: USER_TYPE = 'SYSTEM' and not ( BCODE = 'UNUSED' or PASSCODE = 'UNUSED' ) and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER like '%'

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] Password hashing for SYSTEM user (2)
checkitem.compliant: USER_TYPE = 'SYSTEM' and BCODE = 'USED' and PASSCODE like '%' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER <= '0.00'
checkitem.noncompliant: USER_TYPE = 'SYSTEM' and BCODE = 'USED' and PASSCODE like '%' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and not ( PERC_USER <= '0.00' )

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] Password hashing for SYSTEM user (3)
checkitem.compliant: USER_TYPE = 'SYSTEM' and BCODE like '%' and PASSCODE = 'USED' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and PERC_USER <= '0.00'
checkitem.noncompliant: USER_TYPE = 'SYSTEM' and BCODE like '%' and PASSCODE = 'USED' and PWDSALTEDHASH like '%' and NUM_USER like '%' and not ( PERC_USER <= '0.00' )

checkitem.desc: [p1-CRITICAL] Password hash algorithm
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'login/password_hash_algorithm' and VALUE like_regexpr 'encoding=RFC2307, algorithm=(iSSHA-256|iSSHA-384|iSSHA-512), iterations=(\d{5,}), saltsize=(128|256)'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'login/password_hash_algorithm' and not VALUE like_regexpr 'encoding=RFC2307, algorithm=(iSSHA-256|iSSHA-384|iSSHA-512), iterations=(\d{5,}), saltsize=(128|256)'

checkitem.desc: [p1-CRITICAL] Minimum password length
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'login/min_password_lng' and lpad(VALUE,4,'0') >= '0008'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'login/min_password_lng' and lpad(VALUE,4,'0') < '0008'

checkitem.desc: [p1-CRITICAL] Maximum password idle initial lifetime
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'login/password_max_idle_initial' and lpad(VALUE,4,'0') between '0001' and '0014'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'login/password_max_idle_initial' and not ( lpad(VALUE,4,'0') between '0001' and '0014' )

checkitem.desc: [p1-CRITICAL] Maximum password expiration time
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'login/password_expiration_time' and lpad(VALUE,4,'0') between '0001' and '0183'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'login/password_expiration_time' and NOT (lpad(VALUE,4,'0')between '0001' and '0183')

checkitem.desc: [p1-CRITICAL] Disable downward compatible passwords
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'login/password_downwards_compatibility' and VALUE ='0'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'login/password_downwards_compatibility' and NOT (VALUE ='0')
checkitem.noncomplianttext: login/password_downwards_compatibility = 0. Action Required: Cleanup password hash values

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] Compliance with current password policy must be enforced
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'login/password_compliance_to_current_policy' and VALUE = '1'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'login/password_compliance_to_current_policy' and NOT VALUE = '1'

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] http(s) calls with expired passwords must be rejected
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'icf/reject_expired_passwd' and VALUE = '1'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'icf/reject_expired_passwd' and NOT VALUE = '1'

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] RFC calls with expired passwords must be rejected
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'rfc/reject_expired_passwd' and VALUE = '1'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'rfc/reject_expired_passwd' and NOT VALUE = '1'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for password complexity (digits) must exist (Profile Parameter)
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'login/min_password_digits' and lpad(VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'login/min_password_digits' and not lpad(VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for password complexity (letters) must exist (profile parameter)
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'login/min_password_letters' and lpad(VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'login/min_password_letters' and not lpad(VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for password complexity (lowercase letters) must exist (profile parameter)
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'login/min_password_lowercase' and lpad(VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'login/min_password_lowercase' and not lpad(VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for password complexity (uppercase letters) must exist (profile parameter)
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'login/min_password_uppercase' and lpad(VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'login/min_password_uppercase' and not lpad(VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for password complexity (special characters) must exist (profile parameter)
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'login/min_password_specials' and lpad(VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'login/min_password_specials' and not lpad(VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for number of different previous passwords must exist (profile parameter)
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'login/min_password_diff' and lpad(VALUE,4,'0') >= '0003'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'login/min_password_diff' and not lpad(VALUE,4,'0') >= '0003'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for disabling password logon must exist (profile parameter)
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'login/disable_password_logon' and length(VALUE) >= '1'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'login/disable_password_logon' and not length(VALUE) >= '1'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for maximum failed logon attempts must exist (profile parameter)
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'login/fails_to_user_lock' and lpad(VALUE,4,'0') between '0001' and '0005'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'login/fails_to_user_lock' and not lpad(VALUE,4,'0') between '0001' and '0005'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for automatic user unlock (after failed logins) must exist (profile parameter)
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'login/failed_user_auto_unlock' and VALUE = '0'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'login/failed_user_auto_unlock' and VALUE != '0'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for maximum idle time of productive passwords must exist (profile parameter)
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'login/password_max_idle_productive' and lpad(VALUE,4,'0') between '0001' and '0180'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'login/password_max_idle_productive' and not lpad(VALUE,4,'0') between '0001' and '0180'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for password change for SSO must exist (profile parameter)
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'login/password_change_for_SSO' and VALUE = '1'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'login/password_change_for_SSO' and VALUE != '1'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for password history size must exist (profile parameter)
checkitem.compliant: NAME = 'login/password_history_size' and lpad(VALUE,4,'0') >= '0005'
checkitem.noncompliant: NAME = 'login/password_history_size' and not lpad(VALUE,4,'0') >= '0005'

checkitem.desc: [p1-CRITICAL] Rule for password length is noncompliant (security policy attribute)
checkitem.compliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH' and NAME like '%' and ( CLIENT != '[XXX]' and lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') >= '0008' )
checkitem.noncompliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MIN_PASSWORD_LENGTH' and NAME like '%' and CLIENT != '[XXX]' and NOT lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') >= '0008'

checkitem.desc: [p1-CRITICAL] Rule for initial password lifetime is noncompliant (security policy attribute)
checkitem.compliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MAX_PASSWORD_IDLE_INITIAL' and NAME like '%' and ( CLIENT != '[XXX]' and lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') between '0001' and '0014' )
checkitem.noncompliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MAX_PASSWORD_IDLE_INITIAL' and NAME like '%' and CLIENT != '[XXX]' and NOT lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') between '0001' and '0014'

checkitem.desc: [p1-CRITICAL] Rule for password change attribute is noncompliant (security policy attribute)
checkitem.compliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'PASSWORD_CHANGE_INTERVAL' and NAME like '%' and ( CLIENT != '[XXX]' and lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') between '0001' and '0183' )
checkitem.noncompliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'PASSWORD_CHANGE_INTERVAL' and NAME like '%' and CLIENT != '[XXX]' and NOT lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') between '0001' and '0183'

checkitem.desc: [p2-STANDARD] Rule for enforcement of current password policy is noncompliant (security policy attribute)
checkitem.compliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'PASSWORD_COMPLIANCE_TO_CURRENT_POLICY' and NAME like '%' and ( CLIENT != '[XXX]' and ATTRIB_VALUE = '1' )
checkitem.noncompliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'PASSWORD_COMPLIANCE_TO_CURRENT_POLICY' and NAME like '%' and CLIENT != '[XXX]' and NOT ATTRIB_VALUE = '1'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for password complexity (digits) is noncompliant (security policy attribute)
checkitem.compliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MIN_PASSWORD_DIGITS' and NAME like '%' and ( CLIENT != '[XXX]' and lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001' )
checkitem.noncompliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MIN_PASSWORD_DIGITS' and NAME like '%' and CLIENT != '[XXX]' and NOT lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001'

checkitem.compliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MIN_PASSWORD_LETTERS' and NAME like '%' and ( CLIENT != '[XXX]' and lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001' )
checkitem.noncompliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MIN_PASSWORD_LETTERS' and NAME like '%' and CLIENT != '[XXX]' and NOT lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for password complexity (lowercase letters) is noncompliant (security policy attribute)
checkitem.compliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MIN_PASSWORD_LOWERCASE' and NAME like '%' and ( CLIENT != '[XXX]' and lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001' )
checkitem.noncompliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MIN_PASSWORD_LOWERCASE' and NAME like '%' and CLIENT != '[XXX]' and NOT lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for password complexity (uppercase letters) is noncompliant (security policy attribute)
checkitem.compliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MIN_PASSWORD_UPPERCASE' and NAME like '%' and ( CLIENT != '[XXX]' and lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001' )
checkitem.noncompliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MIN_PASSWORD_UPPERCASE' and NAME like '%' and CLIENT != '[XXX]' and NOT lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for password complexity (special characters) is noncompliant (security policy attribute)
checkitem.compliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MIN_PASSWORD_SPECIALS' and NAME like '%' and ( CLIENT != '[XXX]' and lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001' )
checkitem.noncompliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MIN_PASSWORD_SPECIALS' and NAME like '%' and CLIENT != '[XXX]' and NOT lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') >= '0001'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for number of different previous passwords is noncompliant(security policy attribute)
checkitem.compliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MIN_PASSWORD_DIFFERENCE' and NAME like '%' and ( CLIENT != '[XXX]' and lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') >= '0003' )
checkitem.noncompliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MIN_PASSWORD_DIFFERENCE' and NAME like '%' and CLIENT != '[XXX]' and NOT lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') >= '0003'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for disabling password logon is noncompliant (security policy attribute)
checkitem.compliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'DISABLE_PASSWORD_LOGON' and NAME like '%' and ( CLIENT != '[XXX]' and length(ATTRIB_VALUE) >= '1' )
checkitem.noncompliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'DISABLE_PASSWORD_LOGON' and NAME like '%' and CLIENT != '[XXX]' and NOT length(ATTRIB_VALUE) >= '1'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for disabling ticket logon is noncompliant (security policy attribute)
checkitem.compliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'DISABLE_TICKET_LOGON' and NAME like '%' and ( CLIENT != '[XXX]' and length(ATTRIB_VALUE) >= '1' )
checkitem.noncompliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'DISABLE_TICKET_LOGON' and NAME like '%' and CLIENT != '[XXX]' and NOT length(ATTRIB_VALUE) >= '1'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for maximum failed logon attempts is noncompliant (security policy attribute)
checkitem.compliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MAX_FAILED_PASSWORD_LOGON_ATTEMPTS' and NAME like '%' and ( CLIENT != '[XXX]' and lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') <= '0005' )
checkitem.noncompliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MAX_FAILED_PASSWORD_LOGON_ATTEMPTS' and NAME like '%' and CLIENT != '[XXX]' and NOT lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') <= '0005'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for automatic user unlock (after failed logins) is noncompliant (security policy attribute)
checkitem.compliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'PASSWORD_LOCK_EXPIRATION' and NAME like '%' and ( CLIENT != '[XXX]' and ATTRIB_VALUE = '0' )
checkitem.noncompliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'PASSWORD_LOCK_EXPIRATION' and NAME like '%' and CLIENT != '[XXX]' and ATTRIB_VALUE = '0'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for maximum idle time of productive passwords is noncompliant(security policy attribute)
checkitem.compliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MAX_PASSWORD_IDLE_PRODUCTIVE' and NAME like '%' and ( CLIENT != '[XXX]' and lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') between '0001' and '0180' )
checkitem.noncompliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MAX_PASSWORD_IDLE_PRODUCTIVE' and NAME like '%' and CLIENT != '[XXX]' and NOT lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') between '0001' and '0180'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for password change wait time is noncompliant (security policy attribute)
checkitem.compliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MIN_PASSWORD_CHANGE_WAITTIME' and NAME like '%' and ( CLIENT != '[XXX]' and length(ATTRIB_VALUE) > '0' )
checkitem.noncompliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'MIN_PASSWORD_CHANGE_WAITTIME' and NAME like '%' and CLIENT != '[XXX]' and NOT length(ATTRIB_VALUE) > '0'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for password change for SSO is noncompliant (security policy attribute)
checkitem.compliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'PASSWORD_CHANGE_FOR_SSO' and NAME like '%' and ( CLIENT != '[XXX]' and ATTRIB_VALUE = '1' )
checkitem.noncompliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'PASSWORD_CHANGE_FOR_SSO' and NAME like '%' and CLIENT != '[XXX]' and ATTRIB_VALUE != '1'

checkitem.desc: [p3-EXTENDED] Rule for password history size is noncompliant (security policy attribute)
checkitem.compliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'PASSWORD_HISTORY_SIZE' and NAME like '%' and ( CLIENT != '[XXX]' and lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') >= '0005')
checkitem.noncompliant: ATTRIB_KEY = 'PASSWORD_HISTORY_SIZE' and NAME like '%' and CLIENT != '[XXX]' and NOT lpad(ATTRIB_VALUE,4,'0') >= '0005'
